segments.text: I can't believe the woman has her foot in that puddle and doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like there's a bubble around her, keeping her from seeing the mess surrounding her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to make the biggest mistake of his life by risking it all for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just standing there, looking up at him with wide eyes, full of hope.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a mix of admiration and concern watching their little scheme unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is supposed to be a safe space, but right now it just feels chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could intervene, but part of me just wants to see how it all plays out.
segments.speaker: PAR
